snippet: Nick Korniloff, director of Art Miami, talks about the scene when fairs sprout across the city in early December, and names some of his favorite events overseas.
abstract: Travel Q&A; Art Miami director Nick Korniloff talks about the scene when fairs sprout across the city in early December, and names some of his favorite arts events overseas.
lead_paragraph: Nick Korniloff, director of Art Miami, talks about the scene when fairs sprout across the city in early December, and names some of his favorite events overseas.

headline.main: Navigating Art Fairs in Miami and Beyond
headline.print_headline: Art Miami’s director, NICK KORNILOFF, on navigating art fairs.
